statements: SELECT * FROM StudentEnrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM StudentEnrollment ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM StudentEnrollment;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM StudentEnrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE student_id = 100
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM StudentEnrollment GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_students > 3
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) as total_courses FROM StudentEnrollment
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_registration;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_registration ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_id FROM course_registration WHERE instructor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM course_registration ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_registration WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_course_relation ORDER BY student_id ASC;

SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM student_enrollment JOIN student_course_relation ON student_enrollment.student_id = student_course_relation.student_id JOIN course_registration ON student_course_relation.course_id = course_registration.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, instructor_name FROM student_enrollment JOIN student_course_relation ON student_enrollment.student_id = student_course_relation.student_id JOIN course_registration ON student_course_relation.course_id = course_registration.course_id WHERE student_enrollment.enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT student_name, SUM(credit_hours) AS total_credits FROM student_enrollment JOIN student_course_relation ON student_enrollment.student_id = student_course_relation.student_id JOIN course_registration ON student_course_relation.course_id = course_registration.course_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_credits > 5;

SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS num_students FROM course_registration JOIN student_course_relation ON course_registration.course_id = student_course_relation.course_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY num_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id JOIN Courses ON StudentCourses.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_id = 1;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Enrollments.grade = 'A';

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY Enrollments.enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_major='Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_department='Mathematics';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_major='Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT enrollment_date, student_id, course_id FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_department='Mathematics' ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
